Page-level files such as HomePage.tsx, AboutPage.tsx, ServicesPage.tsx, and Header.tsx are not in the diff. index.css and tailwind.config.js are referenced in the file summaries as updated but their actual diffs are not provided, so full verification of theme application across all pages is not possible from the evidence.
